segments.text: Excuse me , Miss , can you tell me where the bank is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , the bus doesn ’ t go there directly.You have to take the No . 26 bus for five stops and then change to a No . 16 bus and get off at the third stop.When you get off , you can see the bank .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long will it take me to get there ?
segments.speaker: S1
